definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: gird, gird on, gird oneself (NH id., Aram. [[חֲגַר]]; Ar. h.ajara hinder, restrain, so Syr. h.gar; As. agâru, surround, in deriv., Dl:W 105 ff.; Sab. [[מחגרת]] (cf. Ar. mah.jirun, mah.a0jir enclosed space, district, etc.), DHM in MV; also n.pr. dei and loc. [[חגר]], Sab. Denkm.:3. 81. 93 CIS:iv. 1, No. 49 etc.)—

trans., gird some one, with girdle; c. 2 acc. Ex 29:9, Le 8:13 (both P); pass., girded with ephod (acc.) 1Sa 2:18, 2Sa 6:14; sq. [[בְּ]] Da 10:5, c. acc. and [[בְּ]], fig. Pr 31:17, [[חגרה בְּעוז מתניה]] Le 8:7, Le 8:7 (P), c. acc. [[מתנים]] gird up thy loins, i.e. make ready to go 2Ki 4:29, 2Ki 9:1, pass. Ex 12:11 (P); cf. prob. also [[חֲâגוֹרָה עַל־חֲלָחָָיִם]] Is 32:11 gird upon the loins (2nd acc. om.); on verb. form as Imv. fpl. v. AE Ki Ew:§ 226 a Di Du; > as ms. O1:§ 234 a Ges:§ 48. 5 Sta:§ 591 d Kö:§ 20. 12.

gird on, bind on (= gird oneself with), a girdle Ps 109:19 (in sim.); so esp. c. acc. [[שׂק]], [[שׂקים]] of mourning Is 15:3, Is 22:12, La 2:10, Ez Eze 7:18, Eze 27:31, 2Sa 3:31, Je 4:8, Je 6:26, Je 49:3; also 1Ki 20:32 (c. acc. [[שׂק]] + [[ב]] bef. [[מתנים]]); pass., sq. [[על]] bef. obj. of mourning Joe 1:8 (sim.); abs. ([[שׂק]] om.) Joe 1:13 (‖[[ספדו]]); sq. [[חֶרֶד]] 1Sa 25:13, 1Sa 25:13, 1Sa 25:13, De 1:41; Ps 45:4 [[חרד על יׇרֵךְ]] ´[[ח]], so Ju Jdg 3:16, 1Sa 17:39 (sq. acc. + [[מֵעַל]]); c. acc. cogn. [[חגורה]] ´[[ח]] 2Ki 3:21; abs. 1Ki 20:11; pass. Ju Jdg 18:11, Jdg 18:16, Jdg 18:17, 2Sa 20:8 b (where rd. [[חֶרֶב]] Klo Dr—not We), 2Sa 21:16; rd. perh. also [[חָגוּר]] for [[חֲגוֹר]] 2Sa 20:8 c, so Klo Dr.

intr. gird oneself, sq. [[בְּ]] rei Le 16:4 (P), so [[בַיׇּ֑זַע]] ´[[לאׁ יַח]] they shall not gird themselves with sweat (?), but del. SyrVer Co Sgfr; c. acc. rei (fig.) ´[[גִּיל גְּבָעוֹת תַּח]] Ps 65:13 with rejoicing the hills gird themselves; cf. ´[[שְׁאֵרִית חֵמׂת תַּחְ]] Ps 76:11 with a remnant (residue) of wraths thou girdest thyself, so Hi Hup De VB; but very doubtful; LXX Bö Ew rd. [[תְּחָגׇּ֑ךָ]] for [[תַּחגר]]; Bae Ka omit line as corrupt; cf. further Che and crit. n.—[[וְיַחְגְּרוּ]] 2Sa 22:46 is txt. err. for [[וְיַחְרְגוּ]], cf. ‖ Ps 18:46; so Now Hup Kit al.
